properties.Text: 8.3. Please give details of your allocation of operational area to PMDS+CNF, CNF and Non-CNF during last four Rabi seasons (acres and cents)
[If the farmer allocated his entire operational area to PMDS+CNF in Rabi 2022-23, go to Q. No. 8.6].
8.4 If not, reasons for not cultivating PMDS+CNF in the entire cultivated area (Give multiple answers code numbers in the below boxes from Code 20)

properties.ElementsFromString: 1=Not remunerative, 2=Not enough extension services, 3=Non-availability or shortage of seeds, 4=Shortage of biological inputs, 5=Protection of crops from grazing animals, 6=non-availability of suitable tools and instruments (e.g. drums), 7=Shortage of hired labour, 8=Shortage of family labour, 9=Shortage of mulching materials, 10=Shortage of fencing material, 11=May affect the Kharif and Rabi crops timings, 12=Challenges in maintenance of temporary fencing, 13=Non confidence, 14=Others, Specify
